item.title: Why I started a blog?
item.description: Hi there. I’m Anjith Sasindran. An android and web developer living and working in Bangalore. I love programming, gaming, reading about computers and I’m a bit of a gadget freak. I also can type pretty fast ðŸ¤·. I’m currently developing 225Fit and was previously at Grab and before BookMyShow. I play and watch football, enjoys working out and often times read books. I would like to keep most of my blog posts simple and short and straight to the point.
